name: plain.fish
author: changyuheng
full_description:
[![Slack Room][slack-badge]][slack-link] # plain Colorful git-aware plain text prompt

## Features * No need to use a patched font * Colorful * Not folding path * Detecting remote logged in and UID * Integrates Git ## Install With [Fisherman] ``` fisher i plain ``` [slack-link]: https://fisherman-wharf.herokuapp.com/ [slack-badge]: https://img.shields.io/badge/slack-join%20the%20chat-00B9FF.svg?style=flat-square [Fisherman]: https://github.com/fisherman/fisherman
